segments.text: This is a typical kitchen setup with cabinets and a counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over because the sink is full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the tile floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a stool to reach the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He pulls out cookies from the jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink is open to the yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line a path in the garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures everyday home life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window panes nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems in place despite the small issues.
segments.speaker: PAR
